description: Vegetable fritters of all kinds are popular for breakfast or dinner in Ukraine andÂ zucchini and dill work particularly well together.
name: Zucchini & Dill Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the zucchini to a bowl, sprinkle over the salt and set aside for 10 minutes. Whisk the eggs, flour, garlic and dill together in a large bowl to combine.

Squeeze excess liquid out of the courgette with your hands and stir into the batter. Heat the oil in a large non-stick pan on medium heat and add tablespoonfuls of batter, flattening slightly with the back of the spoon.
Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden and crisp. Serve with sour cream on top.
